message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000.  It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers up to $1,200,000 for this product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,200,000 simply isn't enough for me to consider selling.  I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This still leaves room for both of us to benefit from the deal. Let me know if you're interested.

I understand your position, Alice. I will make one final offer. Given my financial constraints, I can only consider an offer of $1,250,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
